Package nusri.fyp.demo.converter

Class ActionObservationConverter

java.lang.Object
nusri.fyp.demo.converter.ActionObservationConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.persistence.AttributeConverter<Map<Long,List<AbstractActionObservation>>,String>
public class ActionObservationConverter extends Object implements jakarta.persistence.AttributeConverter<Map<Long,List<AbstractActionObservation>>,String>
Converter class that serializes and deserializes the Map<Long, List<AbstractActionObservation>> to and from a JSON string for persistence in the database. It uses Jackson's polymorphic serialization mechanism to automatically recognize and deserialize objects into the correct subclass type, such as SinglePrediction. This converter implements AttributeConverter<Map<Long, List<AbstractActionObservation>>, String> and is invoked during the persistence and retrieval of data to and from the database.
See Also:
  • AttributeConverter
  • SinglePrediction
  • AbstractActionObservation

  • Method Details

    • convertToDatabaseColumn

      public String convertToDatabaseColumn(Map<Long,List<AbstractActionObservation>> attribute)
      Converts the entity field, which is a map of Map<Long, List<AbstractActionObservation>>, into a JSON string format to be stored in the database.
      The JSON string contains serialized AbstractActionObservation objects, and specific fields are serialized based on the instance type (e.g., SinglePrediction).
      Specified by:
      convertToDatabaseColumn in interface jakarta.persistence.AttributeConverter<Map<Long,List<AbstractActionObservation>>,String>
      Parameters:
      attribute - The attribute value of type Map<Long, List<AbstractActionObservation>> to be converted.
      Returns:
      The serialized JSON string representing the attribute value.

    • convertToEntityAttribute

      public Map<Long,List<AbstractActionObservation>> convertToEntityAttribute(String dbData)
      Converts a JSON string stored in the database into a Map<Long, List<AbstractActionObservation>>.
      This method uses Jackson's ObjectMapper to deserialize the JSON string back into a map of AbstractActionObservation objects, using the correct subclass for each observation.
      Specified by:
      convertToEntityAttribute in interface jakarta.persistence.AttributeConverter<Map<Long,List<AbstractActionObservation>>,String>
      Parameters:
      dbData - The JSON string stored in the database representing the attribute value.
      Returns:
      A Map<Long, List<AbstractActionObservation>> that corresponds to the deserialized JSON data.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If there is an error during deserialization or the data is invalid.
